column1: I live in a house. It shelters us from the rain
column2: wind and sun. We have cups in our house. We use them to drink water
column4: juice and smoothies. We have flowers in our garden. They are pretty and smell nice too. My brother and I ride our bicycles. We have fun doing this. If I had a horse
column5: I would ride it to my castle. I love my cat! I feed it cat food. If I had a tortoise
column6: I would feed it lettuce. I see trucks on the road near my house. Trucks carry different things around. I am a super hero. I have rainbow powers! I love bright rainbow colours! I can enter a submarine. I can see water animals. I can change shape. I can move easily. I can enter a mouse's home to visit. Superheroes like to eat cake at parties. Cakes are sweet!
